definition: to degrade/to degenerate/to become depraved/corrupt/a fall from grace
to fall or drop/(of the sun) to set/(of a tide) to go out/to lower/to decline or sink/to lag or fall behind/to fall onto/to rest with/to get or receive/to write down/whereabouts/settlement
colloquial reading for 落[luo4] in certain compounds
to leave out/to be missing/to leave behind or forget to bring/to lag or fall behind
to abandon oneself (idiom)/to let oneself go

sentences.english: The guy's depraved…Gets off on violating and humiliating all these women.
sentences.chinese: 这人够堕落最喜欢侵犯和羞辱这些女人。

sentences.english: This fragmentation of relationship is the degenerating factor in our life.
sentences.chinese: 关系的分割是我们生命中的堕落因素。

sentences.english: Because of the nature of their depravity.
sentences.chinese: 是因为她们本性的堕落。

sentences.english: Then, he begins to degenerate, indulge woman's charms.
sentences.chinese: 于是，他开始堕落，沉迷女色。

sentences.english: Christlike vagrant wanders through a perverse and grotesque land filled with religious and sacrilegious imagery.
sentences.chinese: 像督流浪满宗教渎圣象异堕落游荡。

sentences.english: She degraded herself by cheating and telling lies.
Just listen, understand, what is the cause of corruption.
sentences.chinese: 好好听，去理解，腐败堕落的起因是什么？

sentences.english: The ethics of the legal profession, in those days, were somewhat lax.
sentences.chinese: 在那年代，法律界的道德有些废弛堕落。

sentences.english: This is not countermarch or backslide.
If a university punishes this, the university is morally degenerating.
sentences.chinese: 如果大学要因此出发学生，这所大学就太堕落了。

sentences.english: And I thought your family could sink no lower.
sentences.chinese: 我想你们家是堕落得无以复加了。

sentences.english: Never gloat over the ruin of your friend.
sentences.chinese: 不要冷眼旁观看着你的朋友堕落。

sentences.english: Just because I watch TV, does that make meany less of who I already am?
sentences.chinese: 就因为我看电视，我就变得堕落了？

sentences.english: The intervention of Alpha Secundi sends him into a time rift.
sentences.chinese: 塞坤迪出手干预，将堕落金刚再次送进时空裂缝。

sentences.english: Degenerates the angel to sing song of once more the life.
sentences.chinese: 堕落天使再次唱起生命之歌。

sentences.english: I asked the shop owner if he was surprised that his fellow Japanese would stoop so low.
sentences.chinese: 我问他是否对他的同胞如此堕落而感到惊讶。

definition: to abandon oneself (idiom)/to let oneself go
to sink into (vice, depravity etc)/to pass into oblivion/downfall/passing
